mantras.name: 1. Tara Turavira
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA NYURMA PAMO
mantras.description:
FIRST TARA Drölma Nyurma Pamo is semi-wrathful and red in color.
She liberates beings by swiftly removing their suffering and obstacles.
She increases their Bodhicitta, awakened heart.
Upon her lotus flower is a white conch shell that curls clockwise.
The sound of the conch shell symbolizes the healing sound of Dharma.
Its resonance brings love, joy, and compassion to all beings.

mantras.name: 2. Tara Vajra Sarasvati
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA LOTER YANG CHENMA (TĀRĀ SARASVATĪ)
mantras.english_tara_subtitle: Tara the Melodious One, the Treasure of Intelligence
mantras.description:
SECOND TARA Drölma Loter Yang Chenma is peaceful and white in color.
She unlocks the treasures of music, art, wisdom, and knowledge. Upon her lotus flower is a mirror marked with the syllable HRĪṂ.
The mirror and HRĪṂ radiate light in all directions, dispelling confusion and increasing clear wisdom, understanding, and intelligence.

mantras.name: 3. Tara Vasudhara
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA SERMO SÖNAM TOBKYE (TĀRĀ VASUDHĀRĀ / PUṆYOTTAMADĀ)
mantras.english_tara_subtitle: Tara the Golden One Who Bestows Merit
mantras.description:
THIRD TARA Drölma Sermo Sönam Tobye is peaceful and golden yellow in color.
She bestows both material and spiritual wealth and liberates beings through the Transcendent Actions:
Generosity, Discipline, Patience, Diligence, Meditative Stability, and Wisdom.
Upon her lotus flower is a wish-fulfilling jewel that increases merit and prosperity, empowering the accomplishment of Bodhisattva activites.

mantras.name: 4. Tara Usnisa Vijaya
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA TSUGTOR NAMGYALMA (TĀRĀ UṢṆĪṢA VIJAYĀ)
mantras.english_tara_subtitle: Tara, Victorious Queen of Crowning Light
mantras.description:
FOURTH TARA Drölma Tsugtor Namgyalma is peaceful and golden yellow in color like Prajnaparamita.
She bestows long life and protects beings from taking rebirth in unfavorable circumstances.
Upon her lotus flower is a vase of immortality overflowing with healing nectar.
This nectar coordinates the energies of the elements and revitalizes the life force.

mantras.name: 5. Tara Kurukulla
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA WANGDÜ RIGJÉ LHAMO
mantras.description:
FIFTH TARA Drölma Wangdü Rigjé Lhamo is
semi-wrathful and red in color.
She accomplishes the four actions:
pacifying, enriching, magnetizing, and subduing.
She magnetizes the essence of everything that is beneficial.
Upon her lotus flower is a multi-colored bow and arrow poised to shoot red wisdom light in all directions.
This light destroys the pride of all the arrogant ones.

mantras.name: 6. Tara Mahabhairava
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA JIGJE CHENMO (TĀRĀ MAHĀBHAIRAVĀ)
mantras.description:
SIXTH TARA Drölma Jigje Chenmo is wrathful and dark red in color.
She subdues all internal and external negative provocations.
Upon her lotus flower is an indestructible black phurba, ritual dagger.
Wisdom flames emanate from the dagger, subduing negativity.
The flames remove obscurations such as confusion, insanity, and memory loss.

mantras.name: 7. Tara Aparadhrya
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA ZHEN GYI MITUBMA (TĀRĀ APARĀDHRYĀ)
mantras.description:
SEVENTH TARA Drölma Zhen Gyi Mitubma is wrathful and blue-black in color.
She is true love and compassion manifesting as limitless, unbridled protective power.
Upon her lotus flower is a sword blazing with wisdom flames.
Her wisdom flames protect us from lightning, hurricanes, and storms.
The flames destroy all weapons of mass destruction and eliminate natural disasters.

mantras.name: 8. Tara Aparajita
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA ZHEN MIGYALWA'I PAMO (TĀRĀ APARĀJITĀ)
mantras.description:
EIGHTH TARA Drölma Zhen Migyalwa'i Pamo is wrathful and dark red in color.
Her compassion is as swift as lightning, and her mantra protects us from aggression, conflict, and harm.
Upon her lotus flower is a vajra blazing with wisdom flames.
The wisdom flames burn and scatter all fears.
These flames stop arguments, lawsuits, injustice, and war.

mantras.name: 9. Tara Khadiravani
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA SENGDENG NAG (TĀRĀ KHADIRAVANĪ)
mantras.description:
NINTH TARA Drölma Sengdeng Nag is peaceful and emerald green in color.
She protects beings from both outer and inner dangers.
Upon her lotus flower is an eight-spoked Dharma Wheel blazing with emerald light.
This light is her love, compassion, and wisdom.
Her light radiates in all directions, protecting all beings from fear.

mantras.name: 10. Tara Trailokyavijaya
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA JIGTEN SUMLE GYALMA (TĀRĀ TRAILOKYAVIJAYĀ)
mantras.english_tara_subtitle: Tara Who is Victorious Over the Three Worlds
mantras.description:
TENTH TARA Drölma Jigten Sumle Gyalma is peaceful and red in color.
If sentient beings encounter obstacles, she helps them to attain victory.
She joyfully protects beings from distractions to spiritual practice.
Upon her lotus flower is a victory banner, which sends forth red wisdom light, subduing all outer and inner obstacles.

mantras.name: 11. Tara Vasuda
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA NORTERMA (TĀRĀ VASUDĀ)
mantras.description:
ELEVENTH TARA Drölma Norterma is semi-wrathful and golden red in color.
She bestows wealth and liberates beings from all forms of poverty and misery.
Upon her lotus flower is a treasure vase filled with jewels.
Wisdom light streams from her body and the treasure vase, granting all wishes and bestowing the gift of prosperity.

mantras.name: 12. Tara Mangalartha
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA TASHI DÖNJEMA (TĀRĀ MAṄGALĀRTHĀ)
mantras.description:
TWELFTH TARA Drölma Tashi Dönjema is peaceful and golden yellow in color.
She brings timely seasons and healthy children.
She extinguishes fires, stops floods, and brings the elements into balance.
Upon her lotus flower is an auspicious infinity knot.
A stream of cooling energy of love and wisdom comes from her body and infinity knot, removing all negative circumstances.

mantras.name: 13. Tara Ripucakravinasini
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA YÜLLE GYALJEMA
mantras.description:
THIRTEENTH TARA Drölma Yülle Gyaljema is wrathful and dark red in color.
She protects all beings from war and violence, preventing destruction caused by anger and aggression.
Upon her lotus flower stands a vajra with open prongs.
Sparks of wisdom light emanate from her body and the vajra, annihilating all enemies and bringing the return of joy.
She surrounds beings with a protective tent of indestructible vajras.

mantras.name: 14. Tara Bhrkuti
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA TRONYER CHENMA (TĀRĀ BHṚKUṬĪ)
mantras.description:
FOURTEENTH TARA Drölma Tronyer Chenma is extremely wrathful and is blue-black in color, like dense rain clouds.
She transforms and liberates all obstacles into the true nature of reality.
Upon her lotus flower is a pestle.
Wisdom light and flaming vajras radiate from her body and the pestle.
This light destroys all provocations, negativity, and subtle obstacles,
bringing peace and courage to all beings.

mantras.name: 15. Tara Prasanti
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA RABZHIMA (TĀRĀ PRAŚĀNTĪ)
mantras.description:
FIFTEENTH TARA Drölma Rabzhima is peaceful and white like the autumn full moon.
She has the power to purify our greatest misdeeds and obscurations.
Upon her lotus flower is an anointing vase filled with purifying nectar.
Light and purifying nectar emanate from her body and the vase, washing away all negative actions
and bringing bliss and happiness to all beings.

mantras.name: 16. Tara Vidyamantrabalaprasamani
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA RIGNGAG TOBZHOM (TĀRĀ VIDYĀMANTRABALAPRAŚAMANĪ)
mantras.english_tara_subtitle: Tara Who Destroys the Power of Evil Spells
mantras.description:
SIXTEENTH TARA Drölma Rignag Tobzhoma is peaceful and red in color.
She joyfully pacifies all curses and spells from both human and non-human beings.
Upon her lotus flower is a double vajra.
Wisdom light radiates from her body and the double vajra.
This light destroys all bad intentions, bringing peace, love, and
compassion into the hearts of all beings.

mantras.name: 17. Tara Aprameyakramani
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA PAGME NÖNMA (TĀRĀ APRAMEYĀKRAMAṆĪ)
mantras.english_tara_subtitle: Tara Who Stops Immeasurable Invading Forces
mantras.description:
SEVENTEENTH TARA Drölma Pagme Nönma is peaceful and golden red in color like a beautiful sunrise.
Her power eradicates all forms of violence and cruelty, thus she is known as the "Tãra of Nonviolence." Upon her Utpala flower is a golden stüpa.
Rays of wisdom light in the form of countless HŪṂ syllables
radiate from her body and the golden stupa, pacifying violence and bringing peace to all beings.

mantras.name: 18. Tara Mahamayuri
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA MAJA CHENMO (TĀRĀ MAHĀMAYŪRĪ)
mantras.description:
EIGHTEENTH TARA Drölma Maja Chenmo is peaceful and white in color.
She protects the world and all beings from poison and pollution.
She is especially renowned for protecting children.
Upon her lotus flower is a full moon marked with a rabbit.
Beams of white light emanate from her body and the moon, completely removing all poisons and pollutants from the environment and sentient beings.

mantras.name: 19. Tara Sitatapatra
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA MIPHAM GYALMO DUGKARMO (TĀRĀ SITATAPATRĀ)
mantras.english_tara_subtitle: Tara, Invincible Queen of the White Parasol
mantras.description:
NINETEENTH TARA Drölma Dugkarmo is peaceful and white in color.
She protects beings from nightmares, bad omens, and misfortune.
She also protects the Dharma and those who teach it from disputes and disharmony.
Upon her lotus flower is a white parasol.
Sparks of light and vajras emanate from her body and the white parasol, destroying all obstacles and future dangers, bringing calm and peace to all.

mantras.name: 20. Tara Sabari
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA RITRÖ LOMA GYÖNMA
mantras.description:
TWENTIETH TARA Drölma Ritrö Gyönma is
peaceful and yellow like saffron.
Devotedly reciting her mantra dispels all deadly epidemics.
Upon her lotus flower is a round vessel filled with nectar.
Her eyes are like the sun and the full moon.
From the sun of her right eye shines radiant light, destroying all disease-bearing beings.
From the moon of her left eye, a rich stream of nectar descends, healing all forms of disease, including their causes and consequences.

mantras.name: 21. Tara Marici
mantras.english_homage: HOMAGE TO DRÖLMA LHAMO ÖZER CHENMA
mantras.description:
TWENTY-FIRST TARA Drölma Lhamo Özer Chenma
is peaceful and white in color.
She protects our vitality and increases longevity.
She is also renowned for protecting animals and travelers.
Upon her lotus flower is a golden fish.
Wisdom light radiates from her body and the golden fish, summoning the return of the life force that has been lost or stolen and establishing all beings in good health.
